MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseAmendedQualifiers { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出從 WMI 傳回的物件是否應該包含修改的資訊。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the objects returned from WMI should contain amended information.

summary.span: 一般來說，修改的資訊是附加至 WMI 物件的可當地語系化資訊，例如物件和屬性描述。

span.span: Typically, amended information is localizable information attached to the WMI object, such as object and property descriptions.

value.span: 傳回 值，指出從 WMI 傳回的物件是否應該包含修改的資訊。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether the objects returned from WMI should contain amended information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 屬性值Property Value `true` 如果物件傳回從 WMI 應該包含修改過的資訊。否則， `false`。`true` if the objects returned from WMI should contain amended information; otherwise, `false`. 預設值是 `false`。The default value is `false`. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
